content: Daikabutomaru just loves furniture made of <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>. When it gets hungry, it can even use them as an emergency snack. I like furniture made of <style=Highlight>{家具材质}</style> too... No, no, I don't mean I want to eat it. Mhm.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1009伊佐奇_赠礼回礼

content: {A大笑}A <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> flower! I can use it to camouflage like a Kabutomaru! I love it, thank you so very much!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1009伊佐奇_赠礼回礼

content: {A大笑}<style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>, sooo cool!  Can I add "Kabutomaru" to <style=Highlight>"{赠礼}"</style> when I call it? That'd be even cooler!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1009伊佐奇_赠礼回礼

content: {A大笑}When I stand next to <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> furniture, it's hard to detect me, just like Daikabutomaru's camouflage! I loooove this feeling! Thank you so much!

content: {A大笑}<style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> has nature's fragrance. Kabutomaru loves it! Of cooourse, I do too!

content: {A大笑}<style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>! With this on, I can camouflage — Mmph? Looks like I can only camouflage as... myself? Oh well, I'm still extraaa grateful!

content: {A大笑}A <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> gift is sooo fitting for me and Daikabutomaru! Thaaank you, indeed!

content: {A大笑}<style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>, I love it! How did you know I was collecting this type of furniture? You're my soul friend, indeed you are!
